message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $11500 for the product. This price reflects its high value and the opportunity it presents for you. Let me know if this offer interests you, and we can proceed with the transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $10000? This would allow me to purchase the product while staying within my financial limits.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to work within your budget. In light of this, I am prepared to consider a compromise. I would like to offer the product at a price of $10500. This still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin while acknowledging your financial constraints. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and enables us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
